STEP_1.TITLE: Let's go!
STEP_1.DESCRIPTION: Your entire team will get involved from day one with the easiest-to-use CRM on the market. The interface is intuitive and does not require training or a period of implementation and adaptation. The service is free for 14 days. you do not need to Download the software.

STEP_2.TITLE: Provide your contact information
STEP_2.DESCRIPTION: You create a JCRM account, so you will be assigned as an administrator. Later, you can transfer this role to another user.

STEP_3.TITLE: To keep abreast
STEP_3.DESCRIPTION: Do you want to receive news and personal recommendations on setting up and managing information?

STEP_4.TITLE: Complete the setup and confirm
STEP_4.DESCRIPTION: To gain access, you must confirm your registration. Confirmation code sent to {{value}}. If the email is not in your Inbox, check your Spam folder.
